name: Wizard Quest - Magic World
description:
Defend yourself by destroying the medieval hordes with your magic fireballs! Avoid the spikes and obstacles to become the leader.

Features:
- Simple control! Tap to shoot fireballs either slow or fast!
- Jump and collect all the potions to enable your magnetic powers or your shield powers!
- Unlimited levels!
- Fun for all ages!
- Play it today. It's free!
